summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1998, for the improvement of North Eighty-third Street and North Eighty-fourth Street, each from Greenwood Avenue to Stone Avenue, and Woodland Park Avenue from North Eighty-second Street to North Eighty-fourth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 20403, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
